title: MicroVision outlines $30M–$50M revenue target over next 12–18 months while expanding into defense and industrial sectors
excerpt: Gain insights from MicroVision's Q1 2025 earnings call, focusing on industrial and defense growth, revenue targets, and strategic advancements.
text: Earnings Call Insights: MicroVision, Inc. (MVIS) Q1 2025 Management View CEO Sumit Sharma reported ongoing engagement in seven automotive RFQs, noting "incremental progress" but described the environment as "really slow going because of OEM's focus shifting to their global plans" and supply chain issues. Earnings Call Insights: MicroVision, Inc. (MVIS) Q1 2025

Management View

  • CEO Sumit Sharma reported ongoing engagement in seven automotive RFQs, noting "incremental progress" but described the environment as "really slow going because of OEM's focus shifting to their global plans" and supply chain issues. Sharma explained
